title: Disturbing Pics From The Border Surface (Ep 1583)
description:
Troubling images from the border emerge. Also, are they lying to us about the delta variant and children? In this episode, I discuss the compelling data which may destroy the Democrats' new narrative. 

News Picks:


The Hunter Biden scandal gets really ugly.


Shocking images emerge from the exploding border crisis.

Is Donald Trump going to run in 2024? This article provides some insights. 

Biden continues to ignore the inflation disaster brewing during his presidency.

This inflation chart is frightening.

Did the lockdowns cause an explosion in viral infections in children?

Are the vaccines working? New data is troubling.


Dan Bongino All Rights Reserved.
